D

Deck - Class in components
The Deck class represents a deck of cards used in a card game.
Deck() - Constructor for class components.Deck
Constructs a new Deck and initializes it by creating and shuffling the cards.
DeckTests - Class in components
The DeckTests class contains JUnit tests for the Deck class.
DeckTests() - Constructor for class components.DeckTests
 
declaredUno() - Method in class components.players.Player
Checks if the player has declared Uno.
displayColor(Card) - Static method in class utils.PrintUtils
Displays the color of a card in the console using color formatting.
displayHand(String, List<Card>) - Static method in class utils.PrintUtils
Displays the current hand of a player in the console.
displayTopCard(Card) - Static method in class utils.PrintUtils
Displays the top card on the table with color formatting in the console.
draw() - Method in class components.Deck
Draws a card from the deck.
draw() - Method in class components.DeckTests
Test for drawing a card from the deck.
DRAW_TWO - Enum constant in enum class utils.CardType
Represents a Draw Two card that requires the next player to draw two cards and skip their turn.
drawAfterEmptyDeck() - Method in class components.DeckTests
Test for drawing a card after the deck is empty, which should reinitialize the deck.
drawAllCards() - Method in class components.DeckTests
Test for drawing all cards from the deck.
drawCards(int, int, boolean) - Method in class components.Game
Gives the specified user the specified number of cards from the deck and optionally skips their turn.
